title: Get ready for Freaky Thursday!
author: Gracey Wilson
body:
Join us at our annual Teaser Concert tomorrow, Thursday, April 19th at 8:30pm
      to hear a Freaky-Friday-themed sneak preview of our repertoire before our final concert on Saturday, May 5th!
      Prepare yourselves for a hilarious wild ride as PowerChords do Freaky Friday!

title: PREORDER NOW: Currently Charging!
author: Michael Costello
body:
PowerChords' next CD, Currently Charging, is available for pre-order now!
        Click the "Preorder" to learn more and reserve your copy.

title: New Year, New Members, New Concerts
author: Michael Costello
body:
After yet another summer break, PowerChords is back in season!
        Having said goodbye to our lovely graduated seniors Alex and Jennifer,
        we welcome four new first-year members to the group: Gracey, Ilya, Colvin, and William!
        Read their biographies in our "current members" section. We've got a great song lineup for this year
        - stay tuned for updates about upcoming concerts!

title: Heading to BOSS!
author: Michael Costello
body:
The PowerChords are excited to be attending the Boston Sings concert this year!
        We'll be wearing our t-shirts and attending workshops on Saturday. If you see us, say hello!

title: 'Til It Happens To You: Olin PowerChords Sing for Survivors of Sexual Assault
author: Michael Costello
body: The PowerChords recently collaboratated with a number of students and groups at Olin to produce a video for the Sing For Survivors A Cappella Contest. The contest, organized by the makers of the film The Hunting Ground and the White House's It's On Us campaign, features numerous A Cappella groups performing Lady Gaga's 'Til It Happens To You, to raise awareness and promote measures to stop sexual assault. Watch our submission here, and learn more about the film at thehuntinggroundfilm.com

title: ICCA!
author: Michael Costello
body: What a great night! We so appreciated seeing so many of our friends from Olin and beyond in the audience. Thank you for coming out to see us -- we hope you enjoyed our show, and we'll see you at ICCAs again next year! You can watch the (unofficial) video of the performance here

title: Powerchords Charge Up for the ICCA
author: Michael Costello
body:
This year's ICCA will take place on February 20th, starting at 7pm.
        In less than two weeks, the PowerChords will take the stage at Somerville High School
        to compete in the International Collegiate Competition of Acapella! Buy your tickets
        now at varsityvocals.com/event/icca-northeast-quarterfinal-somerville-high-school

title: PowerChords say goodbye to The Franz, say hello to Daniel
author: Michael Costello
body:
Beloved Supersenior Eric 'Franz' Schneider has graduated from Olin and
        is off to explore the world. Come back to visit soon, Franz! We miss you already!
        PowerChords opened mid-year auditions and is excited to welcome Daniel Doherty, '19, to PowerChords!
        You can read his bio in our "Current Members" section.

title: Another New Year!
author: Michael Costello
body:
In the 2014-2015 season, PowerChords lit up the ICCAs with LEDs, attended
        the Boston Sings conference, and had plenty of time to bond as a group. This year,
        after saying good-bye to Ingrid, Riva, Kyle, and Mitch, we're very excited to welcome
        Bryan Werth, William Lu, Katie Butler, Kim Winter, Lauren Gullland, and Linnea Laux to PowerChords!
        Stay tuned for photos, bios, and more updates!

title: New Semester, New Members
author: Kyle McConnaughay
body:
PowerChords is kicking off a new year! We welcomed three new members to
        the group; Michael Costello, Celina Bekins, and Franton Lin. Bios and pictures coming soon!

title: Final Concert Success!
author: Kyle McConnaughay
body:
Our final concert was a great success! Many thanks to the Wellesley Widows
        and Wheaton College Blend for their awesome guest performances. Don't forget that our
        Lion's Club concert is this Friday!

title: End of the Year Concerts
author: Kyle McConnaughay
body:
PowerChords has two performances at the end of this semester! Our final
        concert is May 2nd and will feature the Wheaton College Blend and Wellesley Widows.
        We are also hosting the Lions Club on May 9th and will be joined by Brandeis' Company B
        and the MIT/Wellesley Toons. Hope to see everyone there!

title: ICCA Report
author: Kyle McConnaughay
body:
Congratulations to PowerChords for their performance at their ICCA quarterfinal!
        Kyle won Best Arrangement for Young and Beautiful, soloed by Ingrid Hagen-Keith!

title: Going to ICCA!
author: Kyle McConnaughay
body:
PowerChords is honored to participate in ICCA for the 4th year in a row.
        We'll be performing at Boston University at 7:00 PM on Saturday, February 8th. Best of luck to the other groups!

title: Headed to BOSS
author: Geoff Pleiss
body: We're headed to BOSS! We'll be performing an aca-bomb. Hopefully you'll get to here us sing there!

title: We got 3rd at ICCA!
author: Riva Kahn Hallock
body:
For the first time in PowerChords history, we placed at ICCA quarterfinals!!
        Thank you to everyone who came out to support us and also to the other amazing groups who competed.
        It was an awesome quarterfinal to experience.

title: ICCA IS SATURDAY 2/16!
author: Riva Kahn Hallock
body:
Come support us on Saturday at 8pm at the International Championship of Collegiate A Cappella!
        Hurry, get your tickets!

title: Shameless Plug - Come See PowerChords Perform over Family Weekend
author: Riva Kahn Hallock
body:
Family Weekend is THIS weekend, folks! And we have doubly exciting news!
        First, make sure to stop by AC 113 on Friday Oct. 26th to see PowerChords perform one
        of our sets at 4PM or 5:30PM. Second, come get your copy of our first track-by-track studio
        album, Shameless Plug! Our official release date is this Friday and we will be selling copies for just $15.
        If you thought Surge was great, you won't want to miss Shameless Plug! Right now the only way to get
        a copy is to come visit us at Olin, so we'll see you soon!

title: New Members
author: Riva Kahn Hallock
body:
Welcome to our new, first-year members: Marena, Jennifer, Paige, Rahil, and Mitch!!
        Based on our first full rehearsal tonight, it looks/sounds like we have an incredible semester ahead...

title: Thanks for another great year!
author: Jessie Rucker
body:
Congratulations to our five seniors who graduated from Olin today!!
        We had a fun, impromptu concert in the dining hall to send us off. We had a fabulous year and
        I can't wait to see what happens next year. This is Jessie, signing off as your (now former) PowerChords President.

title: Get Revved up for our Spring Concert!
author: Jessie Rucker
body:
Our Spring Concert is just over two weeks away! We'll see you May 4th, 7:30PM in Milas Auditorium.
        Oh, and study up on Brawl and your Gameboy in the meantime...

title: ICCA 2012!
author: Jessie Rucker
body:
That's right! Your very own Olin PowerChords have once again qualified for ICCA -
        the International Championship for Collegiate A Cappella. With last year's experience under
        our belt we hope to deliver an even more amazing performance this year! Our quarterfinal placement
        still to be announced. See varsityvocals.com for more details.

title: Performances - next two weeks
author: Jessie Rucker
body:
PowerChords will be performing at Needham High School's Take Back the Night
        event on Friday November 4th at Needham High School. The event starts at 6PM. The
        following week on Friday Novemeber 11th we'll be performing at the Wellesley Blue Notes
        Make-A-Wish Foundation Charity Concert in Alumnae Hall. This concert will start at 7:30PM
        and many other groups (a cappella and dance!) will be performing. Should be a good time!

title: Family Weekend Performance
author: Jessie Rucker
body:
PowerChords will be performing at 5:30PM on Friday of Family Weekend (10/14)
        in the 3rd floor hallway of the Academic Center! We will also be doing a "reprise"
        informal performance at 1PM on Saturday in the Wooden Waterfall for those of you who
        cannot make our Friday performance. See you this weekend!

title: Last Minute Performance - Alumni Weekend
author: Jessie Rucker
body:
PowerChords will be performing at 1:15PM on Alumni Weekend in the elevator
        nook by the dining hall. Join the Alumni and hear at least one debut song!
